localString.value: A large, solid ore vein juts out from the ground. This one seems to contain traces of gold ore.
A large, solid ore vein juts out from the ground. This one seems to contain traces of gold ore.
A large, solid ore vein juts out from the ground. This one seems to contain traces of mithral ore.
A large, solid ore vein juts out from the ground. This one seems to contain traces of myrkandite ore.
A large, solid ore vein juts out from the ground. This one seems to contain traces of silver ore.
A large, solid ore vein juts out from the ground. This one seems to contain traces of green verdicite.
A large, solid ore vein juts out from the ground. This one seems to contain traces of green verdicite.
